import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

url = "https://www.alltrails.com/czech-republic"

response = requests.get(url)

soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, "html.parser")

hiking_trails = []

for trail in soup.find_all("div", class_="styles-module__trailCard___2qMH2"):
    trail_name = trail.find("a", class_="styles-module__link___1JYVw").text
    trail_location = trail.find("div", class_="styles-module__location___2yIyJ").text
    trail_difficulty = trail.find("div", class_="styles-module__difficulty___2qVAV").text
    trail_distance = trail.find("div", class_="styles-module__distance___3fPdN").text
    trail_elevation_gain = trail.find("div", class_="styles-module__elevation___1A3JN").text
    trail_rating = trail.find("div", class_="styles-module__rating___1MgjH").text
    trail_reviews = trail.find("div", class_="styles-module__reviewCount___1HvJQ").text
    hiking_trails.append({"name": trail_name, "location": trail_location, "difficulty": trail_difficulty, "distance": trail_distance, "elevation_gain": trail_elevation_gain, "rating": trail_rating, "reviews": trail_reviews})

print(hiking_trails)
